ProductInfo.Features:
CPU: SC6820 1G  optimum performance with multi-tasking
Android 2.3 OS: This Android mobile phone is a brilliantly constructed piece of hardware merged with the Google Android 2.3 OS to provide end users with amazing modern day functionality on the go for their daily communication and entertainment needs.
Dual SIM: This phone comes with Dual SIM technology, allowing you to switch easily between two SIM cards/phone numbers without having to physically take them out and swap them over-saving you time and hassle.
Bluetooth: Another feature of this great cell phone is its Bluetooth capability. Bluetooth allows the phone to communicate without devices, such as hands free headsets, wirelessly-a great solution for people constantly on the move. It also provides a safe and easy way to have a phone conversation while driving.
Quad Band:This phone is unlocked for worldwide use. The phone supports 850/900/1800/1900 MHz. Enjoy worry-free travel wherever you go.
ProductInfo.Name: Cubot Mini Android Unlocked Phones 2.3 1g CPU with 3.5" Capacitive Touchscreen Smartphone (Dual Sim, Wi-fi)
